title: My Account is Level 30 but Cannot Post on Forums Account
body: My summoner's name is the same as my forums name, I know because my match history is the same. My account is level 30 and currently Silver but when I try to post it says "must be at least level 7 in order to post"

replies.body: Sometimes this boards account just needs a little push to get it synced up with your Summoner level. Looks like posting this did the trick!
